entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 02:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Overcast. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
